name: Don't Blink (Lee_Jones)
description:
GAME IS INCOMPLETE AND WILL NOT BE RECIVING AN UPDATE

A short horror game where a teen boy must go and find his older brother after he went into the towns old and abandoned clothing store and never came out, but be careful... Not all is as it seems.

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Move camera

Controller:

Left Analog Stick - Movement

Right Analog Stick - Camera
